data.claim: Duro competitive analysis (Feb 2026): Analyzed 60+ products across 5 categories. Direct competitors: Mem0 ($24M funding, AWS partner), Zep (temporal graphs, enterprise), Letta (MemGPT), Khoj (second brain). Duro's unique moat: (1) Structured memory types (facts/decisions/episodes/evaluations/skills), (2) Decision validation loops, (3) Reputation-based autonomy, (4) 48-hour debug gate, (5) Confidence decay+reinforcement, (6) Local-first full stack. No competitor combines all these. Closest threat: Mem0 (memory-only, no orchestration/learning).
data.snippet: HIGH THREAT: Mem0 (memory layer, $24M), Zep (temporal graphs), Claude Memory (native). MEDIUM: Khoj, Letta, LangGraph. Duro unique features: episode/evaluation tracking, decision validation, reputation autonomy, debug gates, local-first. Market gap: no product combines orchestration + structured learning + local-first.
